verses.name: Luke 17:17
verses.text: And Jesus answering said, Were there not ten cleansed? but where are the nine?

verses.name: Luke 17:18
verses.text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God, save this stranger.

verses.name: Luke 17:19
verses.text: And he said unto him, Arise, go thy way: thy faith hath made thee whole.

verses.name: Luke 17:20
verses.text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees, when the kingdom of God should come, he answered them and said, The kingdom of God cometh not with observation:

verses.name: Luke 17:21
verses.text: Neither shall they say, Lo here! or, lo there! for, behold, the kingdom of God is within you.
